subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Miami had a 16-0 run over the final 4 minutes 28 seconds, with LeBron James scoring the last 10 points of the game, as the Heat advanced to the Eastern Conference finals.
snippet: Miami had a 16-0 run over the final 4 minutes 28 seconds, with LeBron James scoring the last 10 points of the game, as the Heat advanced to the Eastern Conference finals.
